Producer: Nora Ephron, Laurence Mark, Amy Robinson, Eric Steel
Production Co: Laurence Mark Productions, Columbia Pictures, Amy Robinson Productions, Easy There Tiger
Synopsis: Frustrated with a soul-killing job, New Yorker Julie Powell (Amy Adams) embarks on a daring project: she vows to prepare all 524 recipes in Julia Childs' landmark cookbook, "Mastering the Art of French Cooking." Intertwined with Julie's story is the true tale of how Julia Child (Meryl Streep) herself conquered French cuisine with passion, fearlessness, and plenty of butter.
Title: Julie & Julia
